import React from "react"; class Moves extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { currentPokemonName: this.props.currentpokemon.name, currentPokemonMoveOne: this.props.currentpokemon.moves[0].moveName, currentPokemonMoveTwo: this.props.currentpokemon.moves[1].moveName, currentPokemonMoveThree: this.props.currentpokemon.moves[2].moveName, currentPokemonMoveFour: this.props.currentpokemon.moves[3].moveName, fightIsClicked: false, pokemonlistIsClicked: false } } render() { return(

What will {this.state.currentPokemonName} do?

Fight

Pokémon

) } } export default Moves;
